reuze

Class ib_FilterMask

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.ib_a_Ops
      • reuze.ib_FilterMask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.BufferedImageOp

    public class ib_FilterMask
extends ib_a_Ops
    A filter which uses the alpha channel of a "mask" image to interpolate between a source and destination image.
